meanings.definition: A person or thing that entails.
meanings.sent1: The diligent entailers ensured all necessary steps were taken.
meanings.sent2: The group of entailers discussed the project requirements.
meanings.sent3: The entailers had a meeting to plan the upcoming event.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, entailers are like puzzle solvers.
meanings.sent5: The entailers' dedication was evident in their meticulous work.

meanings.sent1: The entailers gathered to share their experiences.
meanings.sent2: We received feedback from various entailers about the product.
meanings.sent3: The entailers' convention was a lively affair.
meanings.sent4: The entailers' unity was their strength in achieving goals.
meanings.sent5: The entailers' diversity brought fresh perspectives to the team.
